Class AbstractGitRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.koraktor.mavanagaiata.git.AbstractGitRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GitRepository
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JGitRepository

    public abstract class AbstractGitRepository
extends Object
implements GitRepository
    An abstract implementation of a Git repository that provides basic and common functionality
    Author:
    Sebastian Staudt
